com.castinfo.devops.robotest

Class SuiteContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.castinfo.devops.robotest.SuiteContext

  • public class SuiteContext
extends Object
    This class contains context object needed for Robotest Suite execution, for example, Report, Selenium Web Driver and Selenium associated Dockers.

    • Method Detail

      • initSuite

        public void initSuite(int order)
               throws RobotestException
        Init configuration (basic and user), report and docker farm.
        Parameters:
        order - Suite execution order.
        Throws:
        RobotestException - errors in IO or timeout Docker Host.

      • endSuite

        public void endSuite()
              throws RobotestException
        Finish report and free docker farm.
        Throws:
        RobotestException - errors ending suite.

      • forzeSeleniumDriversDestroy

        protected void forzeSeleniumDriversDestroy()
        Forze destroy all drivers when end robotest. Only can be called exectuion context to ensure free resources.

      • getDriverByCase

        protected org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getDriverByCase(RobotestCase caseAnnot)
        All cases have loaded Selenium Web Driver accesible with this method.
        Parameters:
        caseAnnot - case annotation.
        Returns:
        WebDriver.

      • getSuiteAnnotation

        public RobotestSuite getSuiteAnnotation()
        Getter method for suite associated annotation.
        Returns:
        the suiteAnnotation

        Setter method for the suite annotation.
        Parameters:
        suiteAnnotation - the suiteAnnotation to set

        Getter method for reporter.

        Setter method for the reporter.

        reporter - the reporter to set

      • getConfig

        public IRobotestConfiguration getConfig()
        Get suite RobotestConfiguration objet. Returned object brings access to basic and custom user configurations.
        Returns:
        RobotestConfiguration.

      • initTestCase

        public void initTestCase(RobotestSuite suiteAnnot,
                         RobotestCase testCaseAnnot)
                  throws RobotestException
        Inits Case test with annotation. Load new Selenium Docker if and connect WebDriver or direct creates local driver without Docker.
        Parameters:
        testCaseAnnot - Case annot.
        suiteAnnot - Suite annot.
        Throws:
        RobotestException - Errors probably IO or creating Docker browser.

      • endTestCase

        public void endTestCase(RobotestCase testCaseAnnot)
                 throws RobotestException
        Ends case report and stop Selenium Docker node if exist and loaded WebDriver.
        Parameters:
        testCaseAnnot - Case annot.
        Throws:
        RobotestException - Errors probably IO or ending Docker browser.

      • initStep

        public void initStep(PageObject pf,
                     long initMillis)
              throws RobotestException
        Init step config and report.
        Parameters:
        pf - PageObject object.
        initMillis - initial step timemillis.
        Throws:
        RobotestException - errors loading step

      • addCustomStepToReport

        public void addCustomStepToReport(PageObject pf,
                                  String idStep,
                                  String stepDescription,
                                  long startMillis,
                                  long endMillis,
                                  StepStatus status,
                                  List<ValidationEntry> listValidationEntries)
                           throws RobotestException
        Adapter for legacy compatibilities.
        Parameters:
        pf - page object
        idStep - custom step id
        stepDescription - custom step description.
        startMillis - step start milliseconds
        endMillis - step end milliseconds
        status - Final step status.
        listValidationEntries - Validation entries list
        Throws:
        RobotestException - errors loading step

      • endStep

        public void endStep(PageObject pf,
                    StepStatus resultadoStatusStep,
                    long endMillis)
        Ends step report.
        Parameters:
        pf - PageObject
        resultadoStatusStep - Step result status.
        endMillis - end time.

      • addAdditionalStepEntry

                                   ValidationEntry additionalEntry)
        Add aditional step validation entry.
        Parameters:
        pf - PageObject
        additionalEntry - additional entry.

      • putIntialitationSuiteError

        protected void putIntialitationSuiteError(ValidationEntry validationEntry)
        Put Report Suite out case initialitation errors. If no reporter available, validation entry is redirected to CONSOLE.
        Parameters:
        validationEntry - validation entry.

      • putCaseError

        protected void putCaseError(RobotestCase caseAnnot,
                            ValidationEntry validationEntry)
        Put Report Case out step initialitation errors.
        Parameters:
        caseAnnot - case annotation.
        validationEntry - validation entry.
